resources.string: COVID-19 App pools all the statistical data into one cohesive platform using the state bulletins and the official handles to update the numbers to help users track real-time information, do the correct trend analysis of india and the world. \n\nMeanwhile, streamers remind the users to avoid the propagation of the virus.
\u2022 Android Studio (4.0.1) \n\u2022 Android device or emulator \n\u2022 Technology: java, xml, json

• Glide 
• Retrofit 2 
• Gson 
• Animated Pie View 
• Circle Image View 
• SwipeRefreshLayout
